## Runtime.EmptyBranchHandler type

Type for handling empty branch nodes during tree composition. The handler receives the branch node, names of failed children, and the resolver for recovery attempts. It can return: - Success(undefined) to omit the branch from the result - Success(value) to use an alternate value for the branch - Failure to propagate the error

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EmptyBranchHandler = (branchNode: IReadOnlyResourceTreeNode<IResource>, failedChildNames: string[], resolver: ResourceResolver) => Result<JsonValue | undefined>;
```
**References:** [IReadOnlyResourceTreeNode](./ts-res.runtime.resourcetree.ireadonlyresourcetreenode.md)<!-- -->, [IResource](./ts-res.runtime.iresource.md)<!-- -->, [ResourceResolver](./ts-res.resourceresolver.md)
